titles.title: Urging the States to include in their driver's license exams at least one question about highway-rail grade crossings safety by fiscal year 2005.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

bill.summary: 10/8/2002--Introduced. Urges the States by FY 2005 to include in their driver's license exams (including commercial driver's license exams) at least one question regarding highway-rail grade crossings safety.
